Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the New York State Real Property Tax Law, with respect to properties in the City of New York, to establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the New York State Real Property Tax Law, with respect to properties in the City of New York, to establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.
